creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: flat, rocky riverbank in foreground; river with a line of boats--two with sails--in middle ground; rising, tree covered hills and bluffs in background
marks: Left margin: [昭和拾七年作, ?????] {Shōwa jūshichinen s LLC: [遠志] {Tōshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Tenryu River
